title: innum varak kANEnE
sahitya:
innum varak kANEnE mannan rajagOpAlan EnO ariyEnadi peNNE enna seigirAnODi 


anupallavi

  munnam tan toNdark-kai mundik-kanindadellAm sonna sol tannOdE tuNaiyAnadOdi 


caraNam    viduran tanda kanjiyum vELviyar tarum sOrum veNNaiyum maNNum uNDadAlE 
mandam aduvum sairandari kaiyAl candaNa gandhangaLum angamEl pUsina Anandam 
poduvil sollap-pOnAl bOdhaiyum talaikkEri puNNiyat-toNDar pADum pOTriyum kAdil Eri
 nadi maiyattaDam tEdi nAnum kanAk kUri nanrAgat-thUnginAnO ennaDi sEdi
